title: Best Nintendo Switch 2 screen protectors
description: Protect your Nintendo Switch 2 display with these screen protectors. The post Best Nintendo Switch 2 screen protectors appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Protect your Nintendo Switch 2 display with these screen protectors.
text: The Nintendo Switch 2 is official and boasts the biggest display on a Nintendo gaming handheld. It sports a huge 7.9-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080 pixels) LCD touchscreen display. This panel supports HDR10 and variable refresh rate up to 120Hz. When docked, you can achieve a gaming resolution of up to 4K UHD. Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!) It means you can enjoy your favorite games on a bigger and better display anywhere you want. However, you should make sure that the display is protected from scratches, smudges, and other possible damage. This is why you should invest in a good-quality screen protector. Check out these best Nintendo Switch 2 screen protectors. Best Nintendo Switch 2 carrying cases Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector (2-pack) This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with an EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away. ZAGG Glass+ Screen Protector This is an expensive screen protector from ZAGG. It has reinforced edges and 3x the strength. It offers complete protection against drops, scratches, and smudges. It has a smudge-resistant surface and odor-fighting treatment. Its installation tray helps with the installation. Sale amFilm OneTouch Screen Protector (2-pack) It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature micro-fiber cleaning cloth and plastic squeeze card. Sale ivoler Screen Protector (4-pack) This ivoler screen protector has 9H rated hardness and 0.33mm thickness. It has an anti-fingerprint coating to keep the display clean. You get three screen protectors with the package. Sale JETech Screen Protector (2-pack) This is another 9H-rated screen protector and is scratch-resistant. It keeps fingerprints, smudges, sweat, and oil residue away via oleophobic and hydrophobic coating. You get two screen protectors in the package. Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness and 2.5D rounded edges. It has a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating to reduce sweat and fingerprints. It also has rainbow-effect-proof properties. html:
The Nintendo Switch 2 is official and boasts the biggest display on a Nintendo gaming handheld. It sports a huge 7.9-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080 pixels) LCD touchscreen display. This panel supports HDR10 and variable refresh rate up to 120Hz. When docked, you can achieve a gaming resolution of up to 4K UHD.

Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!)

It means you can enjoy your favorite games on a bigger and better display anywhere you want. However, you should make sure that the display is protected from scratches, smudges, and other possible damage. This is why you should invest in a good-quality screen protector. Check out these best Nintendo Switch 2 screen protectors.

  • Best Nintendo Switch 2 carrying cases

Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with an EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away.

ZAGG Glass+ Screen Protector

This is an expensive screen protector from ZAGG. It has reinforced edges and 3x the strength. It offers complete protection against drops, scratches, and smudges. It has a smudge-resistant surface and odor-fighting treatment. Its installation tray helps with the installation.

Sale

amFilm OneTouch Screen Protector (2-pack)

It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature micro-fiber cleaning cloth and plastic squeeze card.

Sale

ivoler Screen Protector (4-pack)

This ivoler screen protector has 9H rated hardness and 0.33mm thickness. It has an anti-fingerprint coating to keep the display clean. You get three screen protectors with the package.

Sale

JETech Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is another 9H-rated screen protector and is scratch-resistant. It keeps fingerprints, smudges, sweat, and oil residue away via oleophobic and hydrophobic coating. You get two screen protectors in the package.

Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness and 2.5D rounded edges. It has a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating to reduce sweat and fingerprints. It also has rainbow-effect-proof properties.
